about_the_game:
Skygard Arena is a turn-based tactics game in which you lead your team of Champions to victory in arena-scale skirmishes.

Customize your Champions and combine their unique abilities in clever ways every turn.

Complete challenging missions in the campaign or outsmart other players in PvP!

  • A colorful roster of unique Champions - Choose among 9 Champions to play with, each with their own playstyle and unique abilities. New Champions are planned to be released throughout Early Access!

  • Combine multiple actions on every turn - Choose how to best use your primary, secondary, and ultimate skills to play the most impactful turns.

  • Find the perfect angle - Positioning your Champions is key to use your abilities optimally. Spend your movement action, use dash skills and teleport between two Pillars under your control to find the perfect angle.

  • Assemble a team that fits your playstyle - Combine 3 Champions, choose their Persona and equip them with Artifacts to create a unique team among thousands of possibilities.

  • 1 Champion, 2 Personas - Each Champion can embody two different Personas, alternate versions with their own appearance, gameplay and skillset. Choose wisely which Persona to bring for each Champion and create team synergies.

  • Equipment that matters - Experiment with 72 unique Artifacts that grant unique passive effects to your Champions.

  • Save Skygard -  Follow the five Factions of Skygard in epic encounters for the future of their world. The Tournament of the Ancient starts, and several forces clash to obtain a mysterious crown… The first 3 chapters, which include 15+ missions, are already available, with more to come in future updates.

  • Each mission is a unique challenge - Large-scale battles, skirmishes to capture objectives, infiltration missions, tower-defense challenges, boss fights... each mission offers a unique tactical experience, built specifically for solo play.

  • Learn more about the Champions - Discover the Champions of Skygard, their backstory, and what’s at stake for them.

  • 20-minute intense duels  - Bring your best team to the Arena and nail every turn to outsmart your opponent.

  • Choose your path to victory - Eliminate Champions and capture Pillars to gather victory points, or risk it all with an assault on your opponent’s Main Pillar for an immediate win!

  • Casual or competitive - Fight against your friends online in friendly matches, or climb the ranks in online matchmaking to prove your mastery!

  • A fair PvP experience - With progression systems split between Campaign and Arena, and no RNG for status conditions, critical hits or hit chances, we have created a level playing field for your strategist skills to shine.

  • Battle an AI inspired by chess engines - Test your strategies against an AI which plans its moves several turns in advance. Choose among 4 difficulty levels, with the last level featuring teams built by us for the most challenging experience!

Join the official Skygard Arena Discord to share your feedback with us, chat with the community and join tournaments! Click on the link in the social media section on the right of this page.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel I5 4690 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 / RX 480 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i7 8700K / AMD r5 3600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 2060 / RX 5700 XT (8GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
